page.title: 19CHILDREN'S HOBBIES
page.content: The children of Cheswick Green have many hobbies and pastimes.The most popular pastimes for the boys are football and playing computer games. Many of the younger children, especially girls,attend ballet lessons at the village hall.There are also gymnastic lessons,which are very well attended,and a small number of boys attend a tap dancing class. Many children in Cheswick Green enjoy athletics and a number of them go to an athletics club. Solihull Ice Rink is close to our area,and many children enjoy ice skating and a number of them have lessons. Horse riding,fishing,karate and playing musical instruments are other hobbies and pastimes.One of the main pastimes of all the children is watching television.
